name: Run Pete, Run!
description:
Welcome to this simple (in)finite runner where you can upgrade your character to run longer!

HOW TO PLAY

Use Left/Right arrow or A/D (or Q/D) to strafe left and right.

Use Space to Jump.

Use Down arrow or S to Slide.

HOW TO WIN

Collect pickups to restore some stamina.

Collect coins to upgrade.

Upgrade your character to run longer & beat your highscore :)

Tell me your highscore in the comments!

Enjoy!
